root.name: Moon Ranger
root.description: Moon Ranger is an unlicensed game released for the Nintendo Entertainment System. It was published by Bunch Games, a subsidiary of Color Dreams. When ruthless resource-harvesting aliens land a mining ship on the Moon, the Earth's destruction seems imminent. It is up to the Moon Ranger to combat the invasion force in the depths of space and on their ships. Moon Ranger is broken up into two gameplay segments: side-scrolling shooter and platformer. Neither part is well-conceived, and the game meets the typically low standard of quality of most Color Dreams titles.
